text: Hustlers is a 2019 American comedy-drama movie written and directed by Lorene Scafaria, based on the New York magazine article "The Hustlers at Scores" by Jessica Pressler. The movie stars Constance Wu, Jennifer Lopez, Cardi B, Keke Palmer, Julia Stiles, Lili Reinhart, and Lizzo. ==Release== The movie was released on September 13, 2019, by STX Entertainment. Category:2019 comedy- drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies
title: Hustlers (movie)
